item.title: [pi] staff crown's! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Replace your code’s with this.

</col><img=2>

Repeat for 1-2-3 put this at start and end like this

rank = "</col><img=1>"MODERATOR "+ c.playerName+":";

Reply if it didnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] staff crown's! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey, im using pi source and i just added a ::players command and i wish to add crown’s and change the color of
staff member’s name’s and add crown’s

iv tryed adding this code to it, but it still doesn’t show the crown’s:

String rank = “”;
if (c.playerRights >= 1) {
rank = “<img=1>MODERATOR “+ c.playerName+”:”;
}
if (c.playerRights >= 2) {
rank = “<img=2>@yel@ADMINISTOR@yel@”+ c.playerName+":";
}
if (c.playerRights >= 3) {
rank = “<img=3>@yel@OWNER@yel@”+ c.playerName+" : ";
}

someone please help me. thank’s

Read full topic
